directions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.  Add potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes. Drain, and mash with 1 tablespoon butter and black pepper.  Stir in sour cream, horseradish and parsley.  Whip potatoes and place in medium serving bowl.
Melt remaining 1 tablespoon butter and pour over potatoes.  Serve immediately.
title: Mashed Potatoes with Horseradish
